environment
Class ExtendedStateWithActions<F extends IState,E extends NullableAction>

java.lang.Object
  environment.AbstractState
      environment.ExtendedStateWithActions<F,E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
IState, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExtendedLocalVisionMaabacState
public abstract class ExtendedStateWithActions<F extends IState,E extends NullableAction>
extends AbstractState

For ElementaryCooperativeAgents : a local state is composed of :

  • The limited vision (perception) of the global environment state.
  • The actions of the agent's neighbours

Author:
Francesco De Comite 21 nov. 06
See Also:
